title: atlas_sim_interface_state needs timestamp (to debug bursty comms)

content.raw:
Seeing bursty communications with atlas_sim_interface_state; can't debug because there is not time stampl in message.

Below is output of callback tied to AtlasState message and separated callback tied to AtlasSimInterfaceState message ( text is "ph msg=0.915879") (pelvis height).

Expect to see 4 state messages and then SimInterfaceState.   Not seeing this pattern.  SimInterface states seem much delayed.

```
#!c++
```
